persona.description: Ravi pays his EMIs on time and keeps credit utilization under control. He has a good repayment history but limited credit mix.

weaknesses: High dependency on a single credit source
recommendations: Diversify credit types (e.g., small vehicle loan/credit card).
Avoid frequent loan applications in short time spans.

insights.growth_opportunity: Eligible for larger loans with reduced interest rates if portfolio is diversified.
